body:
This staff is generally carved from or decorated with petrified wood or fossilized bone that has been etched with tiny but complex runes. It allows use of the following spells:

  • Alter self (1 charge)
  • Blink (1 charge)
  • Expeditious retreat (1 charge)
  • Baleful polymorph (2 charges)
  • Polymorph (2 charges)
  • Disintegrate (3 charges)
name: Staff of Transmutation
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Rings/Rods and Staves/Staves/Staff of Transmutation
